metadata.title: CVE-2005-0085

platform: SUSE CORE 9 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE CORE 9 for Itanium Processor Family

metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ht://dig (htdig) before 3.1.6-r7 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary web script or HTML via the config parameter, which is not properly sanitized before it is displayed in an error message.
